data.title: IIE - The Power of International Education
data.meta_description: For general inquiries, contact IIE’s New York headquarters at: +1.212.883.8200 .
data.meta_site_name: IIE - The Power of International Education
data.text:
​Contact Us

General Inquiries

For general inquiries, contact IIE’s New York headquarters at:

One World Trade Center, 36th Floor

New York, NY 10007

+1.212.883.8200

Information on IIE’s offices in the United States and across the globe can be found by clicking the Contact Us tabs on specific office pages here:

IIE Offices

Media Inquiries

Visit our Media Center at iie.org/media-center

Latest News

For Grantees

If you are a grantee of an IIE-administered program, please contact your program advisor with any questions. If you are not a grantee, but would like to learn more about opportunities and IIE programs, please view this index of IIE programs for further information. Contact information can be found on these pages or on linked pages.

Browse IIE managed programs

Fulbright

If you have received a Fulbright grant, please contact your program advisor with any questions. Additional contact information can be found below.

Fulbright U.S. Students Contact Information

Current grantees should visit Current Fulbrighters for health benefits, tax information, Fulbright ASSIST 24/7 support, and more.

Fulbright Scholar Contact Information

Current U.S. Scholar grantees should contact their advisor.

Current Visiting Scholar grantees should contact their advisor.

Fulbright Foreign Students Contact Information

Current Fulbright Foreign Student Program participants should contact their advisor.

Current Fulbright Visiting Student Researchers should contact their advisor.

Fulbright Distinguished Awards in Teaching Program for U.S. Teachers

J-1 Visa Sponsorship

For general J-1 visa sponsorship inquiries, please contact jvisasponsorship@iie.org.

212.984.5313

jvisasponsorship@iie.org

Learn More

IIE Programs

For questions related to an IIE-administered program, contact the relevant program staff member. See an index of all programs for further information.

Scholarship and Funding Opportunities

For international students seeking scholarships and other funding opportunities, please review the pages below. Please note that IIE does not offer individual scholarships to prospective students.

Funding U.S. Study

U.S. students may find funding opportunities on the Generation Study Abroad page, linked below.

Generation Study Abroad Funding Opportunities

If you are a displaced student from Syria or elsewhere, you may find scholarship information on the IIE Platform for Education in Emergencies Response (PEER) page.

IIE PEER

Open Doors and IIE Research Initiatives

For information or requests about IIE’s Open Doors data, please e-mail IIE’s research team at opendoors@iie.org. For more general inquiries about IIE research, please contact iieresearch@iie.org.

Open Doors

Philanthropic Initiatives

For information on how to support IIE, please contact the philanthropy team at:

212.984.5372

philanthropy@iie.org

Joining the IIENetwork

Join our global membership network of more than 7,000 professionals at 1,300 higher education institutions around the world. For more information, contact:

212.984.5367

membership@iie.org

Learn More

Career Opportunities

To apply for a job at IIE, please visit the careers section to learn more about available opportunities. To report technical problems with a job application, contact our Human Resources Department at recruit@iie.org.
